TABLE.NAME: local_smartcare_log
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about smartcare webservice feed.

FIELD.NAME: logtype
FIELD.COMMENT: type of the smartcare log entry.

FIELD.NAME: logdate
FIELD.COMMENT: date of the smartcare log entry.

FIELD.NAME: logdescription
FIELD.COMMENT: description text of smartcare log entry.

FIELD.NAME: logremarks
FIELD.COMMENT: remarks for the smartcare log entry.

FIELD.NAME: read_status
FIELD.COMMENT: validation status for the smartcare log entry.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: Unique ID for this smartcare log message.
